attributes.action: Make it Illegal to run over a cat and driving off
attributes.additional_details: Family member lost there cat and because it’s legal to run over a cat and leave it they are now without there cat.
attributes.background: Make it illegal to run over a cat and just drive off too. Cats are living animals too.

rejection.details:
We're sorry to hear about your family member's cat. We think this petition is calling for the same action:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300310
